info.name: Store API
info.description:
**Store API** provides endpoints for buying various products and listing promotions available for the user

With store API apps can:
  1. buy mtu with or without promotion
  2. buy a combo plan
  3. list promotions 

Currently there are two types of promotions supported:
  1. product discounts. Buy a single product with a discount, like mtu with 10% discount
  2. combo plans, buy multiple products at once, like mtu + calling plans with a discount 

Product type definitions in the Store API
```
  mtu
  voucher
  calling_plan
```

Purchase status definitions in the Store API
```
  success   // purchase ok
  refunded  // purchase refunded
  failed    // purchase failed
  queued    // fulfillment queued and will be processed in the background
  scheduled // purchase scheduled in the future
```

After the purchase the app will get `purchasestatusupdated` events via mqtt/apns/fcm. The app needs to fetch the detailed status using API endpoint `GET /purchases/:id`. The structure of the event is:
```
{
  \"type\": \"purchasestatusupdated\",
  \"id\": \"store-purchase-id\"
}
```
